generate.description: The label for the button that generates subject lines.

generateSubjectLines.description: The label for the button that generates subject lines.

loginAlert.description: The alert that appears when the user is not logged in.

login.description: The label for the button that logs the user in.

emailTextAreaLabel.description: The label for the text area that contains the email body.

emailTextAreaHint.message: Pegue aquí el cuerpo de su correo electrónico.
emailTextAreaHint.description: The hint for the text area that contains the email body.

help.description: The label for the button that opens the help page.

giveUsAReview.description: The label for the button that opens the review page.

upgrade.description: The label for the button that opens the upgrade page.

freeUsesLeft.description: The message that appears when the user has free uses left.

creativityLevel.description: The label for the slider that controls the creativity of the subject lines.

emailBodyErrorText.message: ¡El cuerpo del correo electrónico no puede estar vacío!
emailBodyErrorText.description: The error message that appears when the email body is empty.

errorAlert.message: ¡Ups! Algo salió mal. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo más tarde.
errorAlert.description: The error message that appears when the API call fails.

loginToOpenRateBoost.description: The title of the login page.

paidMonthlyUsage.description: The message that appears when the user has a paid plan.
